pullrequest.title: Pose frame semantics: Suggested semantics to handle maximal coordinates

content.raw: If it's useful, then a relevant example would help communicate that. I assume this means a model that has `<frame>` tags but no `<link>`s? My first guess is that a model with no links is just attached to the world. We use `<joint>` to express parent/child relationships between links; if we aren't using the `affixed_to` attribute for frames, maybe we would need something other way to affix a frame to a link?
content.html: If it's useful, then a relevant example would help communicate that. I assume this means a model that has <frame> tags but no <link>s? My first guess is that a model with no links is just attached to the world. We use <joint> to express parent/child relationships between links; if we aren't using the affixed_to attribute for frames, maybe we would need something other way to affix a frame to a link?
